description.narrative: The PDO is to strengthen institutional capacity for local revenue enhancement and land use management in targeted municipalities, and to enhance climate resilience in the coastal cities of Beira and Maputo.

Ministry of State Administration and Public Function

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I, C, 1. | Description :Ensure that the Municipal Performance Grants are transferred tothe respective Eligible Municipality | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I, C, 5 (a) | Description :Hire a team of independent auditors, whose TOR,qualifications & experience shall be satisfactory to the Association | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I, F (a) | Description :No later than 30 months after the Effective Date carry outjointly with the Association a mid-term review of the progress made in carrying out the project | Due Date :18-Jul-2015
Finance Agreement :PAD - Effectiveness Condition | Description :The Project Implementation Manual has been adopted by the Recipientin a manner satisfactory to IDA | Due Date :18-Jul-2012

Finance Agreement :PAD - Withdrawal Conditions | Description :No withdrawal conditions shall be made for payments under Cat. 3(Municipal Performance Grants under PartA(i)(a) of the Project) ofthe table Section IV of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreementuntil the Recipient has submitted to IDA the Project Grants Manual (PGM) in a manner satisfactory to IDA | Due Date :10-Jul-2013
